tumbnail-description: Hi this is my personal website.

about.title: About
about.text1: Hey, I'm a developer graduated in Software Engineering at UCSal, Postgraduate in Data Engineering at PUC Minas and currently working as Sr Software Engineer at Solutis. I'm {{years}} years old and I'm from Salvador, Bahia, Brazil. Linux enthusiast and love logic problems. For me, the ability to extract and store information is the greatest human skill and I want to expand that capacity through programming.

projects.title: Projects
projects.block: Private repository until publication of the article.

antp.title: Text Analysis for Political News
antp.description: Research work on the application of text analysis techniques in brazilian political news.
